channel.title: Looking for Xeroscape Newest version
channel.description:
i've been looking for this client and have searched up the newest or possibly oldest links to the rapidshare downloads and there all so old that there expired, you can't download the client.
if someone has the newest version of Xeroscape, could you please give me a link to download it that works.
Many thanks,
~Kyle.
